main

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent a Controller path of MVC pattern.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller(GUI gui, Shop shop, Buyer buyer, Packet packet)
      This constructor connects Controller with View (class GUI).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean transferProduct(Shop shop, Buyer buyer, int id)
      This method transfer products between shop and buyer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller(GUI gui,
                  Shop shop,
                  Buyer buyer,
                  Packet packet)
        This constructor connects Controller with View (class GUI).
        Parameters:
        gui - - interface.
        shop - - first interacting object.
        buyer - - second interacting object.
        packet - - third interacting object.

    • Method Detail

      • transferProduct

        public boolean transferProduct(Shop shop,
                               Buyer buyer,
                               int id)
        This method transfer products between shop and buyer.
        Parameters:
        shop - provides products that contain in cart.
        buyer - is receiver of products.
        id - of product.
        Returns:
        status of operation.
